summary: The conversation is between a customer (speaker_0) and a customer service representative (speaker_1) from LendIn Club, a P2P lending platform. The customer had invested in the platform and had a query regarding one of their lending accounts that had been closed.
customer_concerns:
- The customer had not received the money in their wallet when one of their lending accounts was closed.
- The customer was concerned about the possibility of borrowers escaping without repaying the loans, and what would happen to the money lent in such cases.
questions_asked: - The customer asked what would happen if some borrowers escaped without repaying the loans and what would happen to the money lent in such cases.
overall_sentiment: Neutral. The customer was seeking clarification on their concerns, and the customer service representative provided explanations to address the customer's questions.
